activities: Travel Incorporated contracts with corporate entities and partners to consolidate travel data for reporting purposes. The use of this information is determined by the contract. This information may include, but is not limited to, name, address, passport information, travel locations, and dates of travel. The information is shared only with the corporate entity with whom the contract exists and those agents approved by the corporate entity.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, France, Germany, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-Line, Off-Line, Manually Processed, Customer Data
recoursemech: Any questions or concerns regarding the use or disclosure of Personal Information should be directed to the Travel Incorporated Privacy Officer at Travel Incorporated, 4355 River Green Parkway, Duluth, GA 30096. Travel Incorporated will investigate and attempt to resolve complaints and disputes regarding use and disclosure of Personal information in accordance with the principles contained in this Policy. For complaints that cannot be resolved between Travel Incorporated and the complainant, Travel Incorporated has agreed to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the panel established by the European Union data protection authorities to resolve disputes pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
